snippet.title: 'Selfish' Seven Year Switch wife leaves husband
snippet.content: ANOTHER Seven Year Switch couple have called it quits. After just 15 months of marriage, Tallena has revealed she has split with her husband Brad. "I had to be selfish and put myself first," the 29-year-old told New Idea. She added: "I realised I'd been sacrificing my own happiness to make Brad happy, so in the end I had to be selfish and put myself first." "It was a really hard conversation for us to have, but we both knew it wasn't working." The former flight attendant said problems with "communication" and "compromise" were big factors in their split. The Brisbane couple appeared on the first series of the controversial Channel Seven relationship show in 2016. The pair, who were only engaged at the time, experienced tears and fiery clashes as they tried to work through their problems on the show. While many viewers thought they would decide to part ways at the end of the series, the couple surprised everyone by staying together - and getting married soon after. While Tallena told New Idea the decision was mutual, she also suggested Brad, 32, struggled with the decision. Originally published as
